data.title: Usher’s Ex-Wife Tameka Foster Reacts To Usher’s Recent Wedding
data.meta_description: Usher’s ex-wife shares her thoughts on Usher’s suprise wedding. According to reports, Usher married his longtime girlfriend Jennifer Goicoechea right before his Super Bowl Halftime performance in Las Vegas. It was also reported that the two had a private wedding following his performance. During a recent interview, Tameka was asked her thoughts on the nuptials, […]
data.text:
Usher’s ex-wife shares her thoughts on Usher’s suprise wedding.

According to reports, Usher married his longtime girlfriend Jennifer Goicoechea right before his Super Bowl Halftime performance in Las Vegas. It was also reported that the two had a private wedding following his performance.

During a recent interview, Tameka was asked her thoughts on the nuptials, she shared: “I thought he’d been married. I don’t know. I stopped keeping up with that type of thing.”

“That’s like his second… third… I don’t know. I don’t even keep up with his personal,” she added.

She did however go on to that what matters to her is that he is a good father to their two teenage sons, Usher ‘Cinco’ Raymond V, and Navid Ely.
